operationConfig.name: createWFAPPROVALNOTE2636
operationConfig.iMapping: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?><mapper xmlns="http://www.kony.com/ns/mapper">        <map inputpath="request_in" outputpath="request_out">                <exec-function name="kony.gen.obj.request_note__hierarchy.toLOBFields" />                <set-param inputpath="comment" outputpath="COMMENTS" />                <set-param inputpath="createdts" outputpath="ADDED_ON" />                <set-param inputpath="employee_id" outputpath="EMPNUMBER" />                <!--set-param inputpath="id" outputpath=""/-->                         <!--comined value of the refwflow id and the docid and WFLOW_USER-->                <exec-function name="kony.string:substringAfter" outputpath="REF_WFLOW_ID-DOCID-WFLOW_USER" output="$vars">                        <set-arg name="Name" inputpath="approval_id" />                        <set-arg name="Separator" input="-" />                </exec-function>                <!--comined value of the  docid and WFLOW_USER-->                <exec-function name="kony.string:substringAfter" outputpath="DOCID-WFLOW_USER" output="$vars">                        <set-arg name="DOCID-WFLOW_USERKEY" inputpath="$vars/REF_WFLOW_ID-DOCID-WFLOW_USER" />                        <set-arg name="Separator" input="-" />                </exec-function>                <exec-function name="kony.string:substringBefore" outputpath="DOCID" output="$vars">                        <set-arg name="DOCIDUSERKEY" inputpath="$vars/DOCID-WFLOW_USER" />                        <set-arg name="Separator" input="-" />                </exec-function>                 <set-param inputpath="$vars/DOCID" outputpath="DOCID" />      </map></mapper>
operationConfig.oMapping: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?><mapper xmlns="http://www.kony.com/ns/mapper">          <map inputpath="response_in" outputpath="response_out">                    <map inputpath="WF_APPROVAL_NOTE" outputpath="request_note">                              <exec-function name="kony.gen.obj.request_note__hierarchy.fromLOBFields"/>                    </map>          </map></mapper>
